LanguageData.Lovin_FreeApproved.label: free and approved
LanguageData.Lovin_FreeApproved.description: The physical act of love is a noble thing, no matter who does it with whom.
LanguageData.Lovin_Horrible.label: horrible
LanguageData.Lovin_Horrible.description: The physical act of lust is vile, though within marriage it is necessary.
LanguageData.Lovin_Prohibited.label: prohibited
LanguageData.Lovin_Prohibited.description: The physical act of lust is always vile, disgusting, and wrong.
LanguageData.Lovin_SpouseOnly_Mild.label: spouse only (mild)
LanguageData.Lovin_SpouseOnly_Mild.description: Though it's understandable to make love with another outside of marriage, it's not a good thing.
LanguageData.Lovin_SpouseOnly_Moderate.label: spouse only (moderate)
LanguageData.Lovin_SpouseOnly_Moderate.description: To make love with another outside of marriage is wrong.
LanguageData.Lovin_SpouseOnly_Strict.label: spouse only (strict)
LanguageData.Lovin_SpouseOnly_Strict.description: To make love with another outside of marriage is deeply immoral.
